## Description {#details}

Hepler class to perform type promotion.

Definition at line 4669 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/codegenprepare-cpp">CodeGenPrepare.cpp</a>.

## Public Static Functions

### getAction() {#a6df9b95e8bacacbad0035f25c46d2581}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>TypePromotionHelper::Action TypePromotionHelper::getAction (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42; Ext, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-codegenprepare-cpp-/#af2dad33e47a12a0b01b11d97d390f7ee">SetOfInstrs</a> &amp; InsertedInsts, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetlowering">TargetLowering</a> &amp; TLI, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-codegenprepare-cpp-/#a71622f7f81af67784beaf8b1420aa76d">InstrToOrigTy</a> &amp; PromotedInsts)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Given a sign/zero extend instruction <code>Ext</code>, return the appropriate action to promote the operand of <code>Ext</code> instead of using Ext.

<SectionUser title="Returns">
NULL if no promotable action is possible with the current sign extension. <code>InsertedInsts</code> keeps track of all the instructions inserted by the other <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-codegenprepare-cpp-/codegenprepare">CodeGenPrepare</a> optimizations. This information is important because we do not want to promote these instructions as <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-codegenprepare-cpp-/codegenprepare">CodeGenPrepare</a> will reinsert them later. Thus creating an infinite loop: create/remove. <code>PromotedInsts</code> maps the instructions to their type before promotion.
</SectionUser>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/codegenprepare-cpp/#l04793">4793</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/codegenprepare-cpp">CodeGenPrepare.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>

<SectionDefinition>

</MemberDefinition>

### canGetThrough() {#a4bff60d6d38eca058313256cbb4fd09f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool TypePromotionHelper::canGetThrough (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42; Inst, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42; ConsideredExtType, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-codegenprepare-cpp-/#a71622f7f81af67784beaf8b1420aa76d">InstrToOrigTy</a> &amp; PromotedInsts, bool IsSExt)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Utility function to check whether or not a sign or zero extension of <code>Inst</code> with <code>ConsideredExtType</code> can be moved through <code>Inst</code> by either using the operands of <code>Inst</code> or promoting <code>Inst</code>.

The type of the extension is defined by <code>IsSExt</code>. In other words, check if: ext (Ty Inst opnd1 opnd2 ... opndN) to ConsideredExtType. #1 Promotion applies: ConsideredExtType Inst (ext opnd1 to ConsideredExtType, ...). #2 Operand reuses: ext opnd1 to ConsideredExtType. <code>PromotedInsts</code> maps the instructions to their type before promotion.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/codegenprepare-cpp/#l04714">4714</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/codegenprepare-cpp">CodeGenPrepare.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### getOrigType() {#ad884fa0c7a928beebcc76107aab8e760}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static const Type &#42; anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;CodeGenPrepare.cpp&#125;::TypePromotionHelper::getOrigType (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-codegenprepare-cpp-/#a71622f7f81af67784beaf8b1420aa76d">InstrToOrigTy</a> &amp; PromotedInsts, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42; Opnd, bool IsSExt)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "static"]}>
Utility function to query the original type of instruction <code>Opnd</code> with a matched extension type.

If the extension doesn&#39;t match, we cannot use the information we had on the original type. BothExtension doesn&#39;t match any extension type.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/codegenprepare-cpp/#l04694">4694</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/codegenprepare-cpp">CodeGenPrepare.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### promoteOperandForOther() {#a9fd96f1dbfee53b31e81c3ca68b484a5}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Value &#42; TypePromotionHelper::promoteOperandForOther (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42; Ext, <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-codegenprepare-cpp-/typepromotiontransaction">TypePromotionTransaction</a> &amp; TPT, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-codegenprepare-cpp-/#a71622f7f81af67784beaf8b1420aa76d">InstrToOrigTy</a> &amp; PromotedInsts, unsigned &amp; CreatedInstsCost, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42; &gt; &#42; Exts, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42; &gt; &#42; Truncs, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetlowering">TargetLowering</a> &amp; TLI, bool IsSExt)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Utility function to promote the operand of <code>Ext</code> when this operand is promotable and is not a supported trunc or sext.

<code>PromotedInsts</code> maps the instructions to their type before promotion. <code>CreatedInstsCost</code>&#91;out&#93; contains the cost of all the instructions created to promote the operand of Ext. Newly added extensions are inserted in <code>Exts</code>. Newly added truncates are inserted in <code>Truncs</code>. Should never be called directly. 
<SectionUser title="Returns">
The promoted value which is used instead of Ext.
</SectionUser>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/codegenprepare-cpp/#l04747">4747</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/codegenprepare-cpp">CodeGenPrepare.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### promoteOperandForTruncAndAnyExt() {#a95bae4c5ef7d726b41b169b09fd466b1}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Value &#42; TypePromotionHelper::promoteOperandForTruncAndAnyExt (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42; Ext, <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-codegenprepare-cpp-/typepromotiontransaction">TypePromotionTransaction</a> &amp; TPT, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-codegenprepare-cpp-/#a71622f7f81af67784beaf8b1420aa76d">InstrToOrigTy</a> &amp; PromotedInsts, unsigned &amp; CreatedInstsCost, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42; &gt; &#42; Exts, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42; &gt; &#42; Truncs, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetlowering">TargetLowering</a> &amp; TLI)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Utility function to promote the operand of <code>Ext</code> when this operand is a promotable trunc or sext or zext.

<code>PromotedInsts</code> maps the instructions to their type before promotion. <code>CreatedInstsCost</code>&#91;out&#93; contains the cost of all instructions created to promote the operand of Ext. Newly added extensions are inserted in <code>Exts</code>. Newly added truncates are inserted in <code>Truncs</code>. Should never be called directly. 
<SectionUser title="Returns">
The promoted value which is used instead of Ext.
</SectionUser>
